concept.title: Hadoop FS
concept.shortdesc: The Hadoop FS origin reads data from the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) or from other file systems using the Hadoop FileSystem interface. Use this origin only in pipelines configured for cluster batch execution mode.

conbody.p: Hadoop FS originovervieworiginsHadoop FSWhen you configure the Hadoop FS origin, you specify the input path and data format for the data to be read. You can configure the origin to read from all subdirectories and to generate a single record for records that include multiple objects.
The origin reads compressed data based on file extension for all Hadoop-supported compression codecs.
